messages.title: Michelle's the Local Choice!
messages.content: Green Party select local youth worker as candidate. A local theatre and filmmaker who has worked in schools for over 10 years has been selected as the Green Party candidate for Nottingham East in the general election on 12th December.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in tackling the Climate Emergency.
Push for more youth centres and green spaces for play and social activity.
Reform our democracy by giving people the final say on any Brexit deal with a referendum.
£100bn per year investment to radically reshape our economy for net-zero carbon by 2030.
Introduce Proportional Representation system for voting.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour Party is the frontrunner in Nottingham East's race.

issues.brexitEurope: Call a referendum on the Brexit deal and the UK's status in the EU.
issues.economy: £100bn per year investment to radically reshape our economy for net-zero carbon by 2030.
issues.environment: Tackling the Climate Emergency, ethical living, and urgent consideration for our environment.
issues.government: Reform our democracy by giving people the final say on any Brexit deal with a referendum.

community.content: Push for more youth centres and green spaces for play and social activity.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am with the Green Party as they represent my personal values; sharing a vision of ethical living and urgent consideration for our environment which has consistently been central to their policies. A personal priority for me is young people.

images.caption: Michelle Vacciana, your local Green candidate for MP

examples: £100bn per year investment to radically reshape our economy for net-zero carbon by 2030.
I am with the Green Party as they represent my personal values.
Sharing a vision of ethical living and urgent consideration for our environment.
A personal priority for me is young people.
Push for more youth centres and green spaces for play and social activity.
£100bn per year investment to radically reshape our economy for net-zero carbon by 2030.
Reform our democracy by giving people the final say on any Brexit deal with a referendum.

personalStories.story: Michelle promises to implement the Green Party manifesto. She is particularly passionate about young people.

examples: Call a referendum on a Labour Brexit and then refuse to say whether we think the UK is better Remaining or Leaving.
Call a referendum on a Labour Brexit and then refuse to say whether we think the UK is better Remaining or Leaving.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Michelle is also a resident of Nottingham East.

examples: Michelle is also a resident of Nottingham East.
